column3: A social media post is saying a Newberg student has coronavirus. This is UNTRUE. At this time, no Newberg staff or student has the disease. SCHOOLS WILL BE OPEN ON MONDAY. We encourage any student or staff who is ill to remain home to slow the spread of any flu or virus

Subsequent investigation by GreatGameIndia linked the agents to Chinese Biological Warfare Program from where the virus is suspected to have leaked causing the Wuhan Coronavirus outbreak
